import React from'react';import{useCart}from'../contexts/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const cartContext=useCart();if(!cartContext){throw new Error('ProductCard must be used within CartProvider');}const{addItem}=cartContext;const handleBuy=()=>{try{// WhatsApp contact number (with country code, no + sign)
const phoneNumber='919207232303';// Create message with product details
const message="Hello, I am interested in purchasing:

Product: ".concat(product.name,"
Description: ").concat(product.description,"

const whatsappLink="https://wa.me/".concat(phoneNumber,"/?text=").concat(encodedMessage);// Open in new window
window.open(whatsappLink,'_blank','noopener,noreferrer');}catch(error){console.error('Error opening WhatsApp:',error);alert('Unable to open WhatsApp. Please try again.');}};const handleAddToCart=()=>{addItem(product);alert("✅ ".concat(product.name," added to cart!"));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.imageUrl,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-price",children:["$",product.price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-buy",onClick:handleBuy,children:"Buy Now"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-cart",onClick:handleAddToCart,children:"Add to Cart"})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
